chatgpt_double_star.new_statement: Modernize the Electoral College to better track the voters’ intent while preserving state administration: curb winner-take-all by encouraging proportional (or state-chosen mixed) elector allocation, and require electors to follow the state’s certified results. As an incremental alternative, allow a trigger-based interstate compact that takes effect only when enough states join to ensure broad regional buy-in. Pair any structural change with national baseline rules for ballot access, paper records, transparent audits, and consistent recount thresholds, and consider ranked-choice or a uniform runoff to ensure the winner has majority support.

chatgpt_double_star_rankings.new_statement: Modernize the Electoral College in incremental, constitutional steps that keep state-run elections but make outcomes track the popular will more closely: curb winner-take-all by encouraging proportional (or district-based with anti-gerrymandering safeguards) allocation of electors, and allow a National Popular Vote interstate compact once broadly adopted. Pair any structural change with ranked-choice or runoff mechanisms so winners have majority support and spoilers are reduced. Establish clear national baseline standards for ballot access, paper-based records, certification, routine independent audits, and recount triggers to improve transparency and trust across regions.

chatgpt_double_star_personas.new_statement: Reform should keep state-run elections but make the presidential outcome track voters more closely by reducing winner-take-all incentives—through proportional elector allocation or a broadly adopted National Popular Vote compact—with a clear, enforceable requirement that electors follow certified results. Pair any structural change with national baseline rules for ballot access, secure paper ballots, transparent audits, and straightforward recount triggers so results are trusted across parties and regions. Use ranked-choice or a runoff mechanism where feasible to ensure the winner has broad, cross-regional support and to reduce spoiler effects.
